name: Welcome to Tartarus [DEMO]
description:
You wake up in a strange place, one you assume is a prison. 

Before you have time to even gather your bearings, you get taunted by a robotic voice.

"Welcome to Tartaurus, bountyhunter"

You soon realise that if you want to live, you must get out of this abandonned prison. 

Using your intellect that has helped you complete hundreds of bounties, figure out

a way out using the tools at your disposal. 

The odds are against you... Then again, when are they not ?
